resources.string: Thank you for downloading the Floating Lock Button! To get started please enable the device administrator rights to be able to lock the screen. Once it has been activated the floating lock button can be displayed.
Great! Now turn on the switch to display the floating lock button.

Awesome! You can now lock your screen by tapping the little Android button floating on the screen! If you need to move button out of the way, or just don\'t like where it is positioned on the screen, just press and hold to drag it around.
Hmm... It appears something went wrong enabling the device administrator. Try switching it on again later.
